Class DINInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.utils.DINInformation

  • public class DINInformation
extends Object
    This Class gives Informations about DIN A0 to A10 Formats

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getDINFormat(int width, int height, int dpi)
      Returns the best matching (smallest distance) DIN format for a given resolution.
      static String getDINFormatAsString(int din)
      this method returns a string of a given DIN-Format
      static int[] getResolution(int pageFormat, int dpi)
      Returns a Array with the width in position 0 and the height in position 1
      static int[] getScaledResolution(int pageFormat, int dpi, int targetDPI)
      Returns a Array with the width in position 0 and the height in position 1 for a scaled instance
      static int[] getWidthAndHeightInMm(int pageFormat)
      Returns a array with the sidelengths. width in position 0 and height in position 1
